title: Fragments, 1955-25-3-a,b, 18th–20th century
creditline: Gift of L. Boyd and Annie McQuarrie Hatch
description: Pattern of free floral serpentines closely covering ground; in golden yellow cloth weave on pale salmon warp twill ground.  Three kinds of selvages on different breadths - green chevron warp twill; green and white warp twill with cloth edge;  gold warp twill.  Pink and yellow silk fringe of period.  Lined with cotton weft twill.
